column2: Enable the AI to create Extra Bloodlines
Inheritance now depends on bloodline founder : matrilineal inheritance for female founders and patrilineal for male founders.
Bloodlines are inhereted by every offsping ( conditions apply for bastards).
Set the difficulty for creating attribute-related bloodlines
This setting is recommended for players who want bloodlines to be rarer, and would like more of a challenge.
This setting recommended for players who like having an easier time creating bloodlines (default setting).
